name: planetary-response-network-front-end
description: Create Zooniverse subjedcts using Planet Labs API to get images by area of interest (AOI).

scripts.keygen: openssl req -nodes -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout server.key -out server.csr -subj '/C=GB/ST=/L=/O=Zooniverse/OU=/CN=localhost' && openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in server.csr -signkey server.key -out server.crt && rm server.csr && echo 'Generated key server.key, certificate server.crt'
